bibl.title: Some Curious Prescripts (Native Languages in Greek Dress?). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Suggests that the letter-prescript ἐγώ + name in nominative + γράφω + name in dative goes back to the Coptic. Brief examination of a few further cases of possible bilingual interference.
bibl.seg: GONIS Nikolaos, Some Curious Prescripts (Native Languages in Greek Dress?). Avec résumé en anglais.
Suggests that the letter-prescript ἐγώ + name in nominative + γράφω + name in dative goes back to the Coptic. Brief examination of a few further cases of possible bilingual interference.
